text: Winnipeg Winnipeg snowing sleepwalking
Winnipeg my Winnipeg is the latest film
from the Canadian filmmaker guide man
who has lived all of his half-century of
life in the city of Winnipeg and this is
a kind of a love song to that city it's
also a hallucinatory autobiography that
incorporates a lot of strange and
possibly mythical episodes in Canadian
history with a lot of strange and
possibly mythical episodes from Madden's
own life what were you doing out there
a trip to party where did it happen and
the back seat or what happened the real
party there's a lot of old footage in my
Winnipeg that comes from the archives
and then there's a lot of new footage
and it's often hard to tell the
difference because Madden is very good
at making new movies that look uncannily
but also not quite like old movies so
there's a bit of a Trump alloy effect in
here where you don't know quite if what
you're watching is literally real or
some kind of dreamlike ozonated
reenactment
the movie is wonderful even if you don't
know that much about Winnipeg or frankly
don't care that much about the capital
of the province of Manitoba because this
is really about
Madden's own personality his own
artistic temperament his family life his
musings on this city that made him who
he is and Madden is a very mysterious
and enigmatic personality to begin with
so the the fusion of his sensibility in
the subject matter is really is really
something to behold
